title: Hill Country Rage
description: The new financial thriller series endorsed by CFOs, entrepreneurs, and Austin lovers alike.Joe Robbins, the coolest CFO in fiction, is on a freelance assignment for Hill Country Capital, a real estate investment company. Unbeknownst to Joe, the company has ties to the drug cartels. When Joe's best friend (a minority investor in the company) is murdered on an Austin street, Joe begins a relentless quest for justice.Set in Austin, Texas, Hill Country Rage sends Joe on a harrowing journey: spying on smugglers, fighting with a giant, and dodging the war between the drug cartels and the D.E.A.
author: Patrick     Kelly
